constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Parks and Open Spaces

description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 20/01013/HOU (Erection of hip to gable roof and rear dormer extension (with juliet balcony), with 2 x rooflights in front roofslope to facilitate loft conversion; demolition of existing garage and utility room; erection of replacement garage/utility room, front porch and single storey rear extension) to provide additional Velux for living area of loft conversion, Juliet balcony on dormer to be replaced with windows, lantern on roof of rear extension replaced with flat rooflight and extended rear patio door
decision_conditions: Condition 1 of 20/01013/HOU is amended to read as follows:"The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings:EX-001EX-002PL-001 Rev. APL-002 Rev. APL-003PL-004Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning."

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.
Please submit 'Fire Statement/Plan.' If you consider the proposal does not require fire statement, please submit 'Reasonable Exception Statement.'
